description: Updates the content and status of IP rules. Traffic from a source is allowed when the source satisfies either the IpRestrictionRule, VpcIdRestrictionRule, or VpcEndpointIdRestrictionRule. To use this operation, you must provide the entire map of rules. You can use the DescribeIpRestriction operation to get the current rule map.

parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that contains the IP rules.

parameters.name: IpRestrictionRuleMap
parameters.description: A map that describes the updated IP rules with CIDR ranges and descriptions. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: VpcIdRestrictionRuleMap
parameters.description: A map of VPC IDs and their corresponding rules. When you configure this parameter, traffic from all VPC endpoints that are present in the specified VPC is allowed. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: VpcEndpointIdRestrictionRuleMap
parameters.description: A map of allowed VPC endpoint IDs and their corresponding rule descriptions. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: AwsAccountId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that contains the IP rules.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.
